targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_amount AS "DAI",
  token1_amount AS "USDC"
FROM univ3.vw_history_token_amount_difference
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x5777d92f208679db4b9778590fa3cab3ac9e2168'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_larger_diff AS "DAI Leading Diff",
  token1_larger_diff AS "USDC Leading Diff"
FROM univ3.vw_history_token_amount_difference
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x5777d92f208679db4b9778590fa3cab3ac9e2168'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_price AS "DAI",
  token1_price AS "USDC"
FROM univ3.vw_history_top_pools
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x5777d92f208679db4b9778590fa3cab3ac9e2168'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_tick_price AS "DAI Tick Price",
  token1_tick_price AS "USDC Tick Price"
FROM univ3.vw_history_prices_by_tick_range_all
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x5777d92f208679db4b9778590fa3cab3ac9e2168'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_amount AS "DAI",
  token1_amount AS "USDC"
FROM univ3.vw_history_token_amount_difference
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x6c6bc977e13df9b0de53b251522280bb72383700'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT

ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_price AS "DAI",
  token1_price AS "USDC"

WHERE
  pool_id = '0x6c6bc977e13df9b0de53b251522280bb72383700'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_tick_price AS "DAI Tick Price",
  token1_tick_price AS "USDC Tick Price"
FROM univ3.vw_history_prices_by_tick_range_all
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x6c6bc977e13df9b0de53b251522280bb72383700'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_amount AS "USDC",
  token1_amount AS "WETH"
FROM univ3.vw_history_token_amount_difference
WHERE

SELECT

  token0_larger_diff AS "USDC Leading Diff",
  token1_larger_diff AS "WETH Leading Diff"
FROM univ3.vw_history_token_amount_difference
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x8ad599c3a0ff1de082011efddc58f1908eb6e6d8'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  hist_date AS "time",
  token0_price AS "USDC",
  token1_price AS "WETH"
FROM univ3.vw_history_top_pools
WHERE
  pool_id = '0x8ad599c3a0ff1de082011efddc58f1908eb6e6d8'

SELECT

  token0_tick_price AS "USDC Tick Price",
